reviews.Title: Brilliant
reviews.Comment: I have upgraded from Android to iOS for the first time with the IPhone 12 Pro. And the experience is very much satisfactory. The new A14 bionic processor is very fast. The boxy design is what I liked the most. The camera and display are top notch. Night mode photography is excellent. Worth upgrading from Android to iOS .

Great phone but too expensive for no reason.

Doesn't include charger so had to order the charging adapter separately. Charging cable is included but it is type C to lightning. So if you have only USB adapter then it of of no use.

Lookwise it is much better than previous iphones.
The feont cam notch is still old style.
